name: Defuse The Bomb, Now! (Yi-KaG)
description:
Tip : Play at full screen for HD quality How to play?

In this bomb disposal puzzle game, you are controlling a human with help of the AI to disposal the bombs before explodes.

Controls: 

Left Click : Hold to move cables, release to place cables. If you click on "Memory Data" it will activate new dialogue between AI and you.

Middle Mouse Button : Skip the dialog. 

Game Logic:

You can't put cables everywhere. You should put them on pin points. Breadboard comes here to help you. You can place many cables on it.

Click Memory Data with left click to get clues from AI to help you with bomb disposal. Clues will be like "Never unplug red cable!" or "Changing places of red and blue cable is a good option".

But here's the twist: LIAR AI

Since this AI is new about bomb disposal topic, he can give wrong clues too! You must create logic in your head to not explode!
